typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Deltalink as string,
		Id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> tmpEmployees
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Id as string,
		Deltalink as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> tmpContracts
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Id as string,
		Deltalink as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> tmpCustomers
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Id as string,
		Deltalink as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> tmpCustomerSquad
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Id as string,
		Deltalink as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> tmpInvoices
tmpEmployees alterRow(upsertIf(isNull(Id)==false())) ~> UpsertEmployees
tmpContracts alterRow(upsertIf(isNull(Id)==false())) ~> UpsertContracts
tmpCustomers alterRow(upsertIf(isNull(Id)==false())) ~> UpsertCustomers
tmpCustomerSquad alterRow(upsertIf(isNull(Id)==false())) ~> UpsertCustomerSquad
tmpInvoices alterRow(upsertIf(isNull(Id)==false())) ~> UpsertInvoices
tmpEmployees filter(isNull(Deltalink)==false()) ~> FilterRowswithDeltalink
AddTableNameColumn alterRow(updateIf(isNull(Deltalink)==false())) ~> AlterRow1
FilterRowswithDeltalink select(mapColumn(
		Deltalink
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDeltalinkColumn
Deduplicate derive(TableName = 'cr83c_employeeses',
		Deltalink = replace(Deltalink, 'https://siennivt.crm4.dynamics.com/', '' )) ~> AddTableNameColumn
SelectDeltalinkColumn aggregate(groupBy(Deltalink),
	each(match(!in(['Deltalink'],name)), $$ = first($$))) ~> Deduplicate
tmpContracts filter(isNull(Deltalink)==false()) ~> Filter1
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		Deltalink
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(Deltalink),
	each(match(!in(['Deltalink'],name)), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(TableName = 'cr83c_contractses',
		Deltalink = replace(Deltalink, 'https://siennivt.crm4.dynamics.com/', '' )) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(isNull(Deltalink)==false())) ~> AlterRow2
tmpCustomers filter(isNull(Deltalink)==false()) ~> Filter2
Filter2 select(mapColumn(
		Deltalink
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 aggregate(groupBy(Deltalink),
	each(match(!in(['Deltalink'],name)), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate2
Aggregate2 derive(TableName = 'cr83c_customerses',
		Deltalink = replace(Deltalink, 'https://siennivt.crm4.dynamics.com/', '' )) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(updateIf(isNull(Deltalink)==false())) ~> AlterRow3
tmpCustomerSquad filter(isNull(Deltalink)==false()) ~> Filter3
Filter3 select(mapColumn(
		Deltalink
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 aggregate(groupBy(Deltalink),
	each(match(!in(['Deltalink'],name)), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate3
Aggregate3 derive(TableName = 'cr83c_customersquads',
		Deltalink = replace(Deltalink, 'https://siennivt.crm4.dynamics.com/', '' )) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn3 alterRow(updateIf(isNull(Deltalink)==false())) ~> AlterRow4
tmpInvoices filter(isNull(Deltalink)==false()) ~> Filter4
Filter4 select(mapColumn(
		Deltalink
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 aggregate(groupBy(Deltalink),
	each(match(!in(['Deltalink'],name)), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate4
Aggregate4 derive(TableName = 'cr83c_invoiceses',
		Deltalink = replace(Deltalink, 'https://siennivt.crm4.dynamics.com/', '' )) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn4 alterRow(updateIf(isNull(Deltalink)==false())) ~> AlterRow5
UpsertEmployees sink(input(
		Name as string,
		Id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
UpsertContracts sink(input(
		Name as string,
		Id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
UpsertCustomers sink(input(
		Name as string,
		Id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink3
UpsertCustomerSquad sink(input(
		Name as string,
		Id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink4
UpsertInvoices sink(input(
		Name as string,
		Id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink5
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		Deltalink as string,
		TableName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TableName'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Deltalink,
		TableName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> EmployeeDeltalink
AlterRow2 sink(input(
		Deltalink as string,
		TableName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TableName'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Deltalink,
		TableName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink6
AlterRow3 sink(input(
		Deltalink as string,
		TableName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TableName'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Deltalink,
		TableName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink7
AlterRow4 sink(input(
		Deltalink as string,
		TableName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TableName'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Deltalink,
		TableName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink8
AlterRow5 sink(input(
		Deltalink as string,
		TableName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TableName'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Deltalink,
		TableName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink9
